g.text: Add an alarm to client device
[Result of adding an alarm == Failed to add]
Send result of adding an alarm
Send Actiontimer, Alarm, Reminder, and Timer templates
Output voice and display added alarm details
Send result of adding an alarm
include activateAlerts as a required field in Alert.AlertsState)
Request to stop alarm (using utterance or physical button)
[Type of stop alarm request == User utterance]
[Type of stop alarm request == Physical button]
Send the directive to perform the user-scheduled action
